About Us

Shaw Almex India Private Limited, is one of the leading manufacturers and suppliers of belt vulcanizers and transmission belt press, established in the year 1989, at Faridabad, Haryana, India. Our complete product line includes svp sectional vulcanizing press, membrane press, membrane press, vacuum membrane press, thermofoil membrane press, vacuum press... Learn more
